author: Special Correspondent
text:
Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited took out a rally on Friday from Nirmala College to create awareness on oil and gas conservation. DCP (Traffic) R. Sivakumar flagged off the rally.

Territory manger Pradeep Nair, territory co-ordinators Ramesh and Babjee, Bharatgas distributors, staff, and NSS students of Nirmala College participated.
title: Rally taken out
